title: Panic At The C-Suite, Rats > Cats 5.17.21
itunes:title: Panic At The C-Suite, Rats > Cats 5.17.21
description:
In episode 910, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and Deckheads: Chief Stews co-host Molly Lambert to discuss the CDC's new announcements in regards to masks, the welfare queen myth making a comeback, the New York Times both sides-ing the Israel's abuse of Palestinians, the new space race to make movies, how cats affect the eco-system, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Hundreds of Epidemiologists Expected Mask-Wearing in Public for at Least a Year
  2. Ronald Reagan’s “Welfare Queen” Lie Has Been Resurrected
  3. Lies on Social Media Inflame Israeli-Palestinian Conflict
  4. ‘Star Wars: Episode IX’ Director Wants to Shoot on Film, Not Digital — and in Outer Space
  5. Out Of This World! Tom Cruise Plots Movie To Shoot In Space With Elon Musk’s SpaceX
  6. Tom Cruise is officially going to space for his next movie
  7. Space race 2: Russian actor bound for ISS in same month as Tom Cruise
  8. Shoot the Moon: Will Hollywood Ever Film a Blockbuster in Space?
  9. Bad news, Tom Cruise: Shooting that SpaceX movie is going to be almost impossible
  10. this is punk as fuck
  11. 1,000 feral cats released onto Chicago streets to tackle rat explosion
  12. ‘These are working cats’: Meet the feral D.C. felines tasked with hunting rodents
  13. Feral Cats Are Being Deployed in New York’s War on Rats
  14. Cats v. Rats? In New York, the Rats Win
  15. Cats Bad at Nabbing Rats But Feast on Other Beasts
  16. Booming feral cat populations are a disaster, science says. Here are 15 reasons why
  17. LISTEN: Jabair - U.N.I.T.Y.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
